data.prayer: Father, help the 1,939 believers in Mwanza to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mwanza, Malawi
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Mwanza to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Mwanza, Malawi a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Mwanza, Malawi to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Gujarati people. 0.1% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Mwanza. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Mwanza, Malawi into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 6,689 people in the state of Mwanza who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness
